contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary}} To '''alter''' generally means to change something, and may refer to: * [[Alter (name)]], people named Alter * [[Alter (automobile)]] * [[Alter (crater)]], lunar crater * [[Alter Channel]], Greek TV channel * [[Archbishop Alter High School]], Roman Catholic high school in Kettering, Ohio * "Alter", a song by Raven from their 1994 album ''[[Glow (Raven album)|Glow]]'' * [[Self-modifying code#High level languages|ALTER]], command in older implementations of COBOL * [[Alter ego]], or "alter" in popular usage, a "second self" * [[Alter (SQL)]] * [[Alter (album)|''Alter'' (album)]], 2002 album by Floater * ''Alter'', 2006 remix album by Swiss band [[Knut (band)|Knut]] == See also == * [[Altar (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}} [[Category:Latin adjectives in current use]]
